title: I'm not sure if Kled is alone because he's insane, or insane because he's alone
body: Riot, please enlighten us on the state of Yordles' need for companionship.

replies.body: I think you'll enjoy his color text.
Your comment is frustratingly cryptic, but promising.
What is color text? I saw it being mentioned about {{champion:202}} as well, but I didn't get it.

The Extended lore on the Website 

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/jhin/
It took everything away from him. Now he's the Max Payne of yordles.
I mean, if loneliness can turn Veigar into..... Veigar, then I can easily see Kleds isolation making him go insane.
"Big Blue Sky, far green land. Now how can I share this with anyone?"
he looks like a war veteran driven nuts by it imo.
I don't think he feels alone, when Skaarl is around (even if he doesn't directly admit it)

I doubt he ever _feels_ alone, since he does have Skaarl, and brain badgers, and invisible weasels.

However, feeling alone is not equitable to actually being alone. From what it sounds like, Kled has literally no one besides Skaarl, whom he hallucinates speaking on a regular basis. Is it him just being crazy, or a subtle desire for sentient companionship?

Either that, or he actually says the truth when he doesn't want anyone on his ground, except him, Skaarl and his badgers. 
But to know about that we need some red enlightenment, I think
